text: The Champ is a 1979 American drama movie directed by Franco Zeffirelli and is the remake of the 1931 movie of the same name. It stars Jon Voight, Ricky Schroder, Faye Dunaway, Jack Warden, Joan Blondell, Strother Martin and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1980. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Franco Zeffirelli
title: The Champ (1979 movie)
